metadata.title: HCP Packer
metadata.description: HCP Packer registry stores Packer image metadata, enabling you to track your  image lifecycle. Build an Ubuntu machine image, push its metadata to AWS, and  reference the images in Terraform or Packer configuration.

collection.name: Get Started with HCP Packer
collection.description: HCP Packer registry stores Packer image metadata, enabling you to track your  image lifecycle. Build an Ubuntu machine image, push its metadata to AWS, and  reference the images in Terraform or Packer configuration.

tutorials.name: Push artifact metadata to the HCP Packer registry
tutorials.description: Push an artifact's metadata to the Packer registry. Explore the Packer  registry dashboard and view version details.

product.name: Packer
product.description: Learn how to build automated machine images of using Packer.

tutorials.name: Control artifacts with channels
tutorials.description: Create an HCP Packer channel and assign a version to the channel. Query the release channel and deploy the artifact with Terraform.

product.name: Packer
product.description: Learn how to build automated machine images of using Packer.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Immediately revoke insecure artifact versions
tutorials.description: Immediately revoke an artifact version to ensure no one uses insecure artifacts.

product.name: Packer
product.description: Learn how to build automated machine images of using Packer.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Create child artifact from parent artifact
tutorials.description: Create a child artifact using a parent artifact from your HCP Packer registry.

product.name: Packer
product.description: Learn how to build automated machine images of using Packer.

metadata.title: Packer by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Packer helps you create golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration.
